contract.title: Contract
contract.selectSigningMethodDesc: Please choose a digital signature method that suits you
contract.vnptSmartCADesc: Digital signature via VNPT SmartCA app on mobile. Requires VNPT digital certificate.
contract.selfCADesc: Automatically verify and sign the contract through our system.
contract.signingWarning: By signing the contract, you confirm that you have read and agreed to all terms. Please choose the signing method that suits your needs.
contract.escrowBalanceFetchError: Unable to load escrow balance information
contract.escrowPleaseTopUp: Please deposit more to meet the required deposit
contract.escrowPaymentFailed: Payment failed. Please check your wallet balance
contract.escrowPaymentRetryError: Unable to create payment. Please try again
contract.paymentFailedCheckWallet: Payment failed. Please check your wallet balance
contract.fillAllDescriptions: Please fill descriptions for all items
contract.confirmReadTerms: you confirm that you have read and agree to all terms
contract.cannotProcessInvoice: Cannot process invoice. Please try again
contract.pleaseAddAtLeastOneItem: Please add at least one payment item
contract.pleaseAddAtLeastOneService: Please add at least one service
contract.pleaseEnterKwh: Please enter KWh for electricity service
contract.pleaseEnterM3: Please enter M for water service
contract.cannotCreateInvoice: Cannot create invoice. Please try again
contract.tenantSentRequest: Tenant has sent a rental request. Please review and sign the contract.
contract.pleaseReviewAndSign: Please review and sign the contract to continue.
contract.bothPartiesDeposit: Both you and the landlord need to deposit to activate the contract. Please complete the deposit within the specified time.
contract.tenantDeposited2: Tenant has deposited. It is your turn to deposit to activate the contract.
contract.waitingLandlordDeposit: You have completed the deposit. Waiting for landlord to deposit to activate the contract.
contract.bothPartiesDepositedLandlord: Both parties have completed the deposit. Please confirm handover to activate the contract.
contract.bothPartiesDepositedTenant: Both parties have completed the deposit. Waiting for landlord to confirm handover to activate the contract.
contract.vnptSigningInstructions: The system is sending a contract signing request to your phone. Please open the VNPT SmartCA app to sign.
contract.autoSigningInstructions: The system is automatically signing the contract with digital signature. Please wait a moment...
contract.bothPartiesDepositMessage: You and the landlord should deposit for the contract. The system will automatically update the status after completion.
contract.handoverSuccess: Handover successful! Contract has been activated.
contract.cannotConfirmHandover: Cannot confirm handover. Please try again
contract.cannotSignContract: Cannot sign contract. Please try again
contract.paymentFailed: Payment failed. Please check wallet balance
contract.cannotCreatePaymentRetry: Cannot create payment. Please try again
contract.terminationDescription: Submit a request to terminate the contract early. The other party will receive a notification and can accept or reject your request.
contract.terminationNote: The end time must be at least 1 month after the current month and not exceed the contract term
contract.selectMonthHelp: Select the month you want to end the contract (at least 1 month later)
contract.terminationReasonPlaceholder: Please provide the reason you want to terminate the contract early...
contract.terminationReasonHelp: Explain clearly so the other party can consider (10-500 characters)
contract.reasonTooShort: Reason must be at least 10 characters
contract.respondDescription: Review and respond to the early termination request from {name}
contract.responseNotePlaceholder: Add a note about your decision...
contract.responseNoteHelp: You can add a note to explain your decision
contract.confirmAccept: Are you sure you want to accept this termination request? The contract will end in {month}.
contract.confirmReject: Are you sure you want to reject this termination request? The contract will continue according to the original term.
contract.terminationInfo: You can send an early termination request. The request will be sent to {party} for review and response.
contract.cannotCreateTermination: Cannot create termination request. Contract must be active.
contract.contractExpiresOn: Your contract will expire on {date} ({days} days remaining).
contract.wantToExtend: Would you like to send an extension request? The landlord will review and respond to your request.
contract.confirmSigningMessage: Are you sure you want to sign this contract? After confirmation, the system will send a signing request to your phone.
contract.contractNotFoundDesc: The contract does not exist or has been deleted
contract.pendingLandlordDesc: Please review and sign the contract
contract.waitingLandlordHandover: Waiting for landlord to confirm handover
contract.contractEndsIn: The contract will end in {days} days ({date}). If there are damages or incurred fees, please create a liquidation invoice before the contract ends.
contract.contractManagementDescription: View and manage rental contracts in the system
contract.contractManagementComingSoon: Contract management feature will be updated soon
